home.map_data_text: Select project and map input data

mapdata.title: Map your data
mapdata.explanation_1: Select the project you want to participate in and introduce your data for analysis. Data should be extracted from your health information systems following the requirements and specifications of the data model of the use case in which you want to participate
mapdata.explanation_2: Please select the csv files from your system. We recommend that they follow UTF-8 encoding without BOM and with the ' | ' separator.
mapdata.step_checking_rules: Checking data compliance with validation rules
mapdata.step_allset: All set! Go for the analyses
mapdata.notification_1_text_1: Please wait while your files is being uploaded.
mapdata.notification_1_title_2: Log "Mapping data" preview. For more information go to the outputs tab and download the "mapping_input_files.log" file in the logs section.
mapdata.notification_2_text_1: Please wait while your data is being checked.
mapdata.notification_2_title_2: Log "Checking data syntax" preview. For more information go to the outputs tab and download the "checking_data_syntax.log" file in the logs section.
mapdata.notification_3_text_1: Please wait while the data quality assessment is running.
mapdata.notification_3_title_2: Log "Data Quality Assesment" preview. For more information go to the outputs tab and download the "data_quality_assesment.log" file in the logs section.
mapdata.notification_4_title_1: Checking data compliance with validation rules
mapdata.notification_4_text_1: Please wait while data compliance with validation rules is running
mapdata.notification_4_title_2: Log "Checking data compliance with validation rules" preview. For more information go to the outputs tab and download the "checking_data_compliance.log" file in the logs section.

runanalysis.title: Run analysis
runanalysis.explanation: Select the project you want to participate in and launch the analyses provided by the project coordinators. Analyses scripts are open source and can be audited by anyone.
runanalysis.notification_wait: Please wait while your data is being analyzed.
runanalysis.notification_log: Log "Analysis Execution" preview. For more information go to the outputs tab and download the "analysis_execution.log" file in the logs section.
runanalysis.notification_log_error: Log "Analysis Execution" error. For more information go to the outputs tab and download the "analysis_execution.log" file in the logs section.

outputs.title: Outputs
outputs.explanation1: Retrieve your outputs once the analyses have run successfully. Outputs from the analysis may include interactive reports (in HTML format), the DQA report of the data analysed (in HTML format) and aggregated data files to share for the federated analysis for each use case.
outputs.explanation2: (If you cannot select a project, it means that no output files have been found for any of the loaded projects.)
outputs.deleting_text: Are you sure you want to delete all files in the outputs folder?

documentation.title: Documentation
documentation.explanation: In this page you can see the documentation of all the projects that are loaded in the application.
